definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Doing dishes takes longer than using the dishwasher.
sentences.chinese: 洗碟子比用洗碟机的时间要长。

sentences.english: The milk you put out in the saucer was quickly lapped up by the cat.
sentences.chinese: 你倒在碟子里的牛奶很快就被猫舔光了。

sentences.english: Jane, how do you do this? Your plates are always spotless.
sentences.chinese: 简，你是怎么弄的？你家的碟子总是一尘不染。

sentences.english: Each disc to have a 2mm hole near the edge.
sentences.chinese: 每个碟子靠近边缘处要有一个2毫米的孔。

sentences.english: China dishes retain heat longer than metal pans do.
sentences.chinese: 瓷碟子保温的时间要比金属盘久。

sentences.english: He looked with misgiving at the strange food on his plate.
sentences.chinese: 他用疑虑的眼光看看他碟子上奇怪的食物。

sentences.english: We put dirt in square trays.
sentences.chinese: 我们放泥土在矩形碟子里面。

sentences.english: Operates an automatic dishwashing machine that cleans and washes plates, cups, saucers, silverware, glasses and other dishes.
sentences.chinese: 正确使用洗碗机清洁盘，杯，碟子，银具，玻璃杯等。

sentences.english: Prepare a serving plate lightly greased with oil or butter.
sentences.chinese: 准备一个碟子，抹上少许油脂。

sentences.english: You can't put metal dishes in a microwave.
sentences.chinese: 金属制的碟子不能用于微波炉。

sentences.english: The shrimp are not cooked, though hopefully they get some kind of cleaning before they are thrown into the dish still alive.
sentences.chinese: 而这虾并没有煮过，只是在被摆进碟子前有洗过。

sentences.english: A soup spoon should be left in the bowl or on the plate.
sentences.chinese: 汤匙应留在汤碗中，或放在碟子上。

sentences.english: The dishes and bowls slid together with a clatter.
sentences.chinese: 碟子碗碰得丁丁当当的。

sentences.english: TV dinners are cooked and often served on throw-away trays.
sentences.chinese: 电视上的烹饪节目也经常使用一次性的碟子。

sentences.english: Placed all the egg, ham &cucumber slices in a serving plate.
sentences.chinese: 将切丝后的蛋，黄瓜和火腿盛在一个碟子里。

definition: see 鍋|锅[guo1]/see 涮鍋子|涮锅子[shuan4 guo1 zi5]/bowl (of a smoking pipe etc)
jug (earthenware with a big belly and a small opening)
